name: It's Over There
description:
Chaotic multiplayer factory building, in the spirit of Overcooked.

Build conveyors to move resources to the cannon and fire on the boss! Make sure the cannon is in the same lane as the boss before firing though.

Keyboard controls: (WASD + EF) or (ARROWS + RSHIFT + LCTRL)

Xbox controller controls: (LEFT STICK + A + X)
